summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5105 for the improvement of Corson Avenue, from Dawson Street to Shelton Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 58683 amended by Ordinance No. 59063, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
